Document:
# Chain of Command
The new commander of the operation does not assume a new rank, title or powers such as access changes, but other personnel must follow their orders that pertain to directing the operation.
- Commanding Officer - Executive Officer - Auxiliary Support Officer - Staff Officer - Chief MP - Chief Medical Officer - Chief Engineer - Pilot Officer - Intelligence Officer - Quartermaster - Senior Enlisted Advisor - Warden - Military Police - Squad Leader (Starts at Alpha and goes through the squads) - Ranking military personnel (Any squad role, starting at Alpha and through the squads.)
